prompt.initial_prompt: You will play a game with {n_rounds} rounds. In each round you'll see active cues (letters): One cue shows an alternating color pattern (RED, GREEN, RED, GREEN...) Other cues show random colors Cues appear and disappear randomly each round At least one cue active per round After {n_rounds} rounds, identify which cue showed the alternating pattern. Correct: +100 points, Wrong: -100 points.
